About

Let me tell you a little about myself

My name is...

My name is Robert Stoyanov and currently I am studying computer science at New Bulgarian University.I upload all my major projects from there on my GitHub account.
I used to be sporty guy and tried all kinds of sports. At the age of 17, I found out about programming. My "Hello, World!" program was in C# thanks to some videos on Youtube. When I graduated high-school I was still that sporty guy but I also wanted to continue with my second love, technology. I went to New Bulgarian University in 2018 and started studying computer science although I wasn't sure what to expect and if it will suit me. From the beginning, teachers started talking about algorithms and math but I wasn't into that at all. Thereafter, I realized that without these two things I won't become a good programmer. At the end of first semester, I found out that there is something called Frontend and I liked it. That's where I decided that I want to continue to develop in that area. But because of the lack of information about Frontend at university, I actually study it all by myself.
